item.title: Blog: SFOSC Has a New Documentation Theme!
item.description:
We were having a hard time fitting in business models, a book, news, and other content that didn’t seem to fit in any of these categories, and so we found a new theme, Docsy that allows us much more freedom to do that!

  • Documentation: Is found under the “docs” base, with an easy to use navigation bar on the left, and links to edit or ask a question on the right.
  • Blog: is what you are reading now! We can both write news posts, and announce new releases.
  • Community is a resource to help you easily find community links.

item.title: Blog: July 2019 Documentation
item.description: This is a new release of the sfosc documentation base. A release will be posted here.
